== Introduction ==

Welcome to the South Dakota LoCo Team Knowledge Base. Whether you are an Ubuntu newbie or the time-tested Linux professional, we welcome you to our Knowledge Base.

If you happen to come across something that is deficient, please, please bring it to our attention using the mailing list.

Remember, help is always one click away -- if you cannot find what you're looking for here, DO NOT lose hope.  

== About Us ==

The South Dakota Ubuntu Local Community Team promotes the use of Ubuntu and other open source technologies in South Dakota through service, education, and advocacy.  

== Materials ==

You can find documents and other materials for our LoCo can be found at <nowiki>[[ SouthDakotaTeam-Materials ]]</nowiki>.
